Type.name: acserrHandlersErr
Type.description: Errors used by Unspecified and Uncaught handlers

ErrorCode.name: UnspecifiedACSBasedException
ErrorCode.description: An unspecified ACS Based exception was thrown. This means that an exception was thrown but the exception is not listed in the function specification.

ErrorCode.name: UnspecifiedCORBAException
ErrorCode.description: An unspecified CORBA exception was thrown. This means that an exception was thrown but the exception is not listed in the function specification.

ErrorCode.name: UnspecifiedUnknownException
ErrorCode.description: An unspecified Unknown exception was thrown. This means that an exception was thrown but the exception is not listed in the function specification.

ErrorCode.name: UncaughtACSBasedException
ErrorCode.description: An uncaught ACS Based exception was thrown

ErrorCode.name: UncaughtCORBAException
ErrorCode.description: An uncaught CORBA exception was thrown

ErrorCode.name: UncaughtUnknownException
ErrorCode.description: An uncaught Unknown exception was thrown

ErrorCode.name: UncaughtUnspecifiedException
ErrorCode.description: An unspecified exception was thrown which caused uncaught exception.
